description.narrative: Output 8.4 Communications, Advocacy and Partnerships: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: OUTCOME 8: The Nigeria country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 8.4 Communications, Advocacy and Partnerships: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders

description.narrative: The strategic thrust of the CAP section is on reinvigorating the UNICEF brand, thought leadership, visibility and public advocacy role to highlight the situation of children and women including in emergencies through improved engagement with the media, donors, private sector and other stakeholders. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of high-profile individuals (including GWAs, influencers, political/community/religious leaders, etc.) who publicly support/amplify UNICEF advocacy messages and initiatives
Number of articles/stories with UNICEF mentions in top-tier media outlets
Number of people reached on UNICEF social media channels
Number of journalists reached with capacity building and information regarding UNICEF
